mapper.select: SELECT post.post_id, post.title, post.price, postImage.image_URL FROM post, postImage WHERE post.post_id = postImage.post_id ORDER BY post_id DESC
SELECT * FROM post INNER JOIN postImage USING (post_id) WHERE post_id=#{id}
SELECT p.*, i.image_url FROM post p INNER JOIN postimage i ON p.post_id = i.post_id WHERE category_id=#{category_id}

SELECT p.*, u.nickname, u.user_image, i.image_url, u.user_number FROM post p INNER JOIN userlist u ON p.user_number= u.user_number INNER JOIN postimage i ON p.post_id = i.post_id WHERE p.post_id = #{post_id}
SELECT count(post_id) FROM post WHERE user_number=#{user_number}

SELECT p.*, i.image_url, u.nickname, u.user_image FROM post p INNER JOIN postimage i ON p.post_id = i.post_id INNER JOIN userlist u ON p.user_number= u.user_number WHERE p.user_number=#{user_number} AND p.post_id NOT IN (#{post_id}) ORDER BY p.post_id DESC
SELECT count(*) FROM wishlist INNER JOIN post USING (post_id) WHERE post_id=#{post_id}
